description: N-equivalence classes of threshold gates of exactly n variables.
references: S. Muroga, Threshold Logic and Its Applications. Wiley, NY, 1971, p. 38, Table 2.3.2. - Row 8.
S. Muroga, T. Tsuboi and C. R. Baugh, Enumeration of threshold functions of eight variables, IEEE Trans. Computers, 19 (1970), 818-825.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Muroga, Saburo, Iwao Toda, and Satoru Takasu, Theory of majority decision elements, Journal of the Franklin Institute 271.5 (1961): 376-418. [Annotated scans of pages 413 and 414 only]
S. Muroga, T. Tsuboi and C. R. Baugh, Enumeration of threshold functions of eight variables, IEEE Trans. Computers, 19 (1970), 818-825. [Annotated scanned copy]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
